alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from Rush to near Truckton to 7 miles south of Fountain. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fountain, Hanover, Yoder, Truckton, Pinon and Rush. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
